data.title: Ukraine's Marta Kostyuk chooses not to shake hands with Belarusian opponent Victoria Azarenka at US Open
data.description: Ukrainian tennis player Marta Kostyuk refused to shake hands with Belarusian opponent Victoria Azarenka after their US Open match on Thursday.

data.title: US Open's 'Tennis Plays for Peace' raises $1.2 million for Ukraine relief
data.description: On Wednesday, the US Open held its 'Tennis Plays for Peace' event for Ukraine relief ahead of the start of the year's final grand slam event, raising $1.2 million, according to the United States Tennis Association (USTA).

data.title: Naomi Osaka pulls out of Pan Pacific Open in Tokyo due to illness on Thursday
data.description: Four-time grand slam champion Naomi Osaka withdrew from her second-round match against Beatriz Haddad Maia at the Pan Pacific Open on Thursday due to illness, ending her title defense at the tournament.

data.title: Nick Kyrgios complains of marijuana smell during US Open second round win
data.description: Nick Kyrgios was left frustrated by the smell of marijuana coming from the stands in his second round win at the US Open on Wednesday.

data.title: World of sport reacts to Roger Federer's retirement
data.description: The outpouring of praise and admiration in the wake of Roger Federer's retirement announcement is a testament to the Swiss tennis star's remarkable impact and legacy in the world of tennis, sport and beyond.

data.title: Behind the 'raw' photo of Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal that captures their enduring friendship
data.description: Photographer Ella Ling expected Roger Federer's farewell from tennis to be charged with emotion -- though when the moment arrived, the outpouring of tears and adulation caught her by surprise.

data.title: Roger Federer announces his retirement from the ATP Tour and grand slams
data.description: Roger Federer has announced that he will retire from the ATP Tour and grand slams following the Laver Cup next week in London.

data.title: Serena Williams 'paved the way' for mothers to keep playing tennis, says Martina Navratilova
data.description: Tennis great Martina Navratilova thinks more women will continue to play professional tennis after having children -- thanks largely to Serena Williams.

data.title: Rafael Nadal drops first set but rallies to defeat Rinky Hijikata at US Open
data.description: Rafael Nadal dropped his opening set at the US Open but recovered to defeat Australian wildcard Rinky Hijikata 4-6 6-2 6-3 6-3.

data.title: Roger Federer set to play 'special' final match of career on Friday with Rafael Nadal
data.description: After numerous close battles against each other over the years, Roger Federer will get to enjoy what he called a "special moment" in partnering with Rafael Nadal for the final match of his career.

data.title: Serena Williams teases return to competitive tennis, says Tom Brady 'started a really cool trend'
data.description: Little more than two weeks after she was knocked out of the US Open -- a moment many thought would be the last act of her tennis career -- Serena Williams has teased her potential return to the sport.

data.title: American Frances Tiafoe upsets Rafael Nadal in 4th round of US Open
data.description: Twenty-two-time grand slam champion Rafael Nadal was upset in the fourth round of the US Open on Monday by American Frances Tiafoe at Arthur Ashe Stadium in Flushing, New York.

data.title: US tennis star feels some people don't want Black players to succeed
data.description: He's one of his country's brightest prospects on the tennis tour, but US star Frances Tiafoe says a lack of diversity in the sport makes him feels like an "outsider."

data.title: 'An important part of my life is leaving too,' says emotional Rafael Nadal
data.description: When the end came neither Roger Federer or Rafael Nadal could hold back the tears.

data.title: Nick Kyrgios complains of marijuana smell during US Open second round win
data.description: Nick Kyrgios was left frustrated by the smell of marijuana coming from the stands in his second round win at the US Open on Wednesday.

data.title: Serena Williams 'paved the way' for mothers to keep playing tennis, says Martina Navratilova
data.description: Tennis great Martina Navratilova thinks more women will continue to play professional tennis after having children -- thanks largely to Serena Williams.

data.title: Serbian scientists name new species of beetle after Novak Djokovic
data.description: Serbian scientists have named a new species of beetle after tennis great Novak Djokovic due to its speed, strength, flexibility, durability and ability to survive in a difficult environment, Serbian media reported on Friday.

data.title: Rafael Nadal says he and his family are 'very well' after birth of first child
data.description: Rafael Nadal says he's thankful for all the messages of support and well-wishes he has received since the birth of his son.

data.title: World of sport reacts to Roger Federer's retirement
data.description: The outpouring of praise and admiration in the wake of Roger Federer's retirement announcement is a testament to the Swiss tennis star's remarkable impact and legacy in the world of tennis, sport and beyond.

data.title: Roger Federer brings down curtain on his career with a defeat, but still dazzles alongside longtime friend and rival Rafael Nadal
data.description: Swiss tennis great Roger Federer has lost his final professional match, playing doubles alongside contemporary and rival Rafael Nadal of Spain at the Laver Cup.

data.title: Serena Williams teases tennis fans as she says 'I'm not retired'
data.description: Serena Williams continues to tease tennis fans about whether they will see her back on court, this time saying she is "not retired" from the sport.

data.title: Venus Williams bows out in first round of women's singles at US Open
data.description: A day after her sister Serena advanced to the second round of the singles play at US Open tennis tournament, Venus Williams was not as fortunate, losing in straight sets to Alison Van Uytvanck of Belgium.

data.title: Rafael Nadal drops first set but rallies to defeat Rinky Hijikata at US Open
data.description: Rafael Nadal dropped his opening set at the US Open but recovered to defeat Australian wildcard Rinky Hijikata 4-6 6-2 6-3 6-3.

data.title: Simona Halep provisionally suspended after testing positive for banned substance
data.description: Former world No. 1 Simona Halep has been provisionally suspended from tennis after testing positive for a prohibited substance at this year's US Open.
